title: Slow Page Loading
description: Homepage takes over 10 seconds to load. Users are leaving before content appears.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Customers report reset emails expire instantly. Unable to change password.

title: Cart Items Disappear
description: Products added to cart vanish after refresh. Checkout cannot be completed.

title: Notifications Not Showing
description: App does not show push alerts. Users miss important updates and reminders.

title: Language Selection Missing
description: Dropdown for choosing languages is gone. Customers can’t switch to English.

title: Order History Not Loading
description: Past purchases not visible. Customers can’t track orders or download invoices.

title: Chat Support Disconnects
description: Live chat closes after 1 minute. Customers lose conversations and agents.

title: Coupon Codes Not Applied
description: Valid coupons are rejected at checkout. Customers can’t use discounts.

title: Profile Update Not Saved
description: Changes to profile info revert after refresh. Users can’t update accounts.

title: App Logout Randomly
description: Users are logged out suddenly during use. Sessions expire too quickly.
